item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, December 11, 2024 at 8:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. FCC opens entire 6 GHz band to low power device operations (182 points | 56 comments)
2. AI Guesses Your Accent (30 points | 26 comments)
3. PeerTube mobile app: discover videos while caring for your attention (227 points | 89 comments)
4. Launch HN: Azalea Robotics (YC S24) – Baggage-handling robots for airports (51 points | 30 comments)
5. X41 Reviewed Mullvad VPN (75 points | 8 comments)
6. RISC-V HiFive Premier P550 Development Boards with Ubuntu Now Available (85 points | 40 comments)
7. Gemini 2.0: our new AI model for the agentic era (469 points | 239 comments)
8. Pgroll – Zero-downtime, reversible, schema changes for PostgreSQL (new website) (86 points | 19 comments)
9. Dioxus 0.6 – Crossplatform apps with Rust (132 points | 62 comments)
10. Django and Postgres for the Busy Rails Developer (75 points | 24 comments)
11. Trillium TPU Is GA (61 points | 19 comments)
12. Show HN: Convert your LinkedIn profile to a resume (9 points | 8 comments)
13. Charge Robotics (YC S21) is hiring MechEs to build robots that build solar farms ( | hide)
14. Making memcpy(NULL, NULL, 0) well-defined (171 points | 144 comments)
15. Voice providers face removal for failing robocall mitigation requirements (56 points | 22 comments)
16. Bankruptcy judge rejects sale of Infowars to The Onion (441 points | 683 comments)
17. Consider Rexx for Scripting (2022) (16 points | 11 comments)
18. Helium: Lighter Web Automation with Python (121 points | 39 comments)
19. OpenLoco: An open source re-implementation of Chris Sawyer's Locomotion (33 points | 10 comments)
20. WPEngine, Inc. vs. Automattic– Order on Motion for Preliminary Injunction (282 points | 106 comments)
21. Bi-elliptic transfer orbit maneuver (41 points | 22 comments)
22. Show HN: KeyTik: The All-in-One Automation Tool (23 points | 4 comments)
23. Understanding the Odin Programming Language (111 points | 46 comments)
24. The case against Google's claims of "quantum supremacy" (142 points | 94 comments)
25. Phantom Vibrations of a Lost Smartphone (31 points | 13 comments)
26. Chatbot 'encouraged teen to kill parents over screen time limit' (47 points | 19 comments)
27. Estimated concentrations of atrazine in agricultural groundwater (130 points | 60 comments)
28. Dear OAuth Providers (28 points | 4 comments)
29. How WhatsApp for business changed the world (33 points | 80 comments)
30. Machine Learning-Driven Static Profiling for GraalVM Native Image (28 points | 3 comments)
